name: HackTool - RemoteKrbRelay Execution
description: Detects the use of RemoteKrbRelay, a Kerberos relaying tool via CommandLine flags and PE metadata.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)

detection.condition: selection_img or selection_cli_required or all of selection_cli_attack_rbcd_* or selection_cli_attack_changepass or selection_cli_attack_addgrpname or selection_cli_attack_smb
